verses.verse: עַ֥ל <WH5921> By נַהֲר֨וֹת ׀ <WH5104> By the rivers בָּבֶ֗ל <WH894> of Babylon שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> There יָ֭שַׁבְנוּ <WH3427> there we sat down גַּם־ <WH1571> again בָּכִ֑ינוּ <WH1058> yea we wept בְּ֝זָכְרֵ֗נוּ <WH2142> when we remembered אֶת־ <WH853> צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> Zion
עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon עֲרָבִ֥ים <WH6155> upon the willows בְּתוֹכָ֑הּ <WH8432> in the midst תָּ֝לִ֗ינוּ <WH8518> We hanged כִּנֹּרוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH3658> our harps

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For שָׁ֨ם <WH8033> there שְֽׁאֵל֪וּנוּ <WH7592> required שׁוֹבֵ֡ינוּ <WH7617> For there they that carried us away captive דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> act שִׁ֭יר <WH7892> us [one] of the songs וְתוֹלָלֵ֣ינוּ <WH8437> and they that wasted שִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> us [required of us] mirth שִׁ֥ירוּ <WH7891> [saying] Sing לָ֝֗נוּ מִשִּׁ֥יר <WH7892> of the songs צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> of Zion
אֵ֗יךְ <WH349> How נָשִׁ֥יר <WH7891> How shall we sing אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁיר־ <WH7892> song יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD'S עַ֝֗ל <WH5921> and אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> land נֵכָֽר׃ <WH5236> in a strange
אִֽם־ <WH518> If אֶשְׁכָּחֵ֥ךְ <WH7911> If I forget יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <WH3389> thee O Jerusalem תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח <WH7911> forget יְמִינִֽי׃ <WH3225> let my right hand

תִּדְבַּ֥ק־ <WH1692> cleave לְשׁוֹנִ֨י ׀ <WH3956> thee let my tongue לְחִכִּי֮ <WH2441> to the roof of my mouth אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֪א <WH3808> not אֶ֫זְכְּרֵ֥כִי <WH2142> If I do not remember אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אַ֭עֲלֶה <WH5927> if I prefer אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֑ם <WH3389> not Jerusalem עַ֝֗ל <WH5921> Above רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> above my chief שִׂמְחָתִֽי׃ <WH8057> joy

זְכֹ֤ר <WH2142> Remember יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> O LORD לִבְנֵ֬י <WH1121> the children אֱד֗וֹם <WH123> of Edom אֵת֮ <WH853> י֤וֹם <WH3117> in the day יְֽרוּשָׁ֫לִָ֥ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem הָ֭אֹ֣מְרִים <WH559> who said עָ֤רוּ ׀ <WH6168> Rase עָ֑רוּ <WH6168> [it] rase עַ֝֗ד <WH5704> very הַיְס֥וֹד <WH3247> [it even] to the foundation בָּֽהּ׃

בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter בָּבֶ֗ל <WH894> of Babylon הַשְּׁד֫וּדָ֥ה <WH7703> who art to be destroyed אַשְׁרֵ֥י <WH835> happy שֶׁיְשַׁלֶּם־ <WH7999> [shall he be] that rewardeth לָ֑ךְ אֶת־ <WH853> גְּ֝מוּלֵ֗ךְ <WH1576> the recompense שֶׁגָּמַ֥לְתְּ <WH1580> have repaid לָֽנוּ׃

אַשְׁרֵ֤י ׀ <WH835> Happy שֶׁיֹּאחֵ֓ז <WH270> [shall he be] that taketh וְנִפֵּ֬ץ <WH5310> and dasheth אֶֽת־ <WH853> עֹ֝לָלַ֗יִךְ <WH5768> thy little ones אֶל־ <WH413> Against הַסָּֽלַע׃ <WH5553> against the stones
